https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rXkbCGUGb2Ik8yQEbFREQWfp7M7.jpg Berlin Flash Frames makes use of unedited film found in the National Archives of the United States. Labeled with the title “Berlin 1961,” the reel contains raw footage shot for a propaganda film produced by the U. S. Information Agency. Berlin Flash Frames
